alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 12:35AM CST until February 16 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1234 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cass, or 11 miles north of Ozark, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Wolf Pen Campground... Catalpa... Arbaugh... Yale... Friley... Fallsville... Oark... Dixon Ridge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
